Home > Data > Magic schools > Time

Time

The elemental magic of time focuses on the manipulation of temporal energies, time travel, and the flow of time.

Properties

FocusTime Manipulation, Stasis, Aging
RegulationExtremely dangerous with catastrophic potential, thus most time magic heavily regulated with severe penalties
